service.name: pcap
service.file:
#!/bin/sh # set tcpdump options here (see 'man tcpdump' for help) # (-s snap length, -C limit pcap file length, -n disable name resolution) DUMPOPTS="-n" TSHARK_PATH=/home/seraph/Desktop/tshark_output HN=`hostname` SCRIPTDIR=$SESSION_DIR LOGDIR=/var/log
if [ "x$1" = "xstart" ]; then
tcpdump ${DUMPOPTS} -w n1.eth0.pcap -i eth0 < /dev/null & tcpdump ${DUMPOPTS} -w n1.eth1.pcap -i eth1 < /dev/null &
elif [ "x$1" = "xstop" ]; then mkdir -p ${TSHARK_PATH}/pcap mv *.pcap ${TSHARK_PATH}/pcap
fi

service.name: pcap
service.file:
#!/bin/sh # set tcpdump options here (see 'man tcpdump' for help) # (-s snap length, -C limit pcap file length, -n disable name resolution) DUMPOPTS="-n" TSHARK_PATH=/home/seraph/Desktop/tshark_output HN=`hostname` SCRIPTDIR=$SESSION_DIR LOGDIR=/var/log
if [ "x$1" = "xstart" ]; then
tcpdump ${DUMPOPTS} -w n3.eth0.pcap -i eth0 < /dev/null & tcpdump ${DUMPOPTS} -w n3.eth1.pcap -i eth1 < /dev/null & tcpdump ${DUMPOPTS} -w n3.eth2.pcap -i eth2 < /dev/null &
elif [ "x$1" = "xstop" ]; then mkdir -p ${TSHARK_PATH}/pcap mv *.pcap ${TSHARK_PATH}/pcap
fi

service.name: pcap
service.file:
#!/bin/sh # set tcpdump options here (see 'man tcpdump' for help) # (-s snap length, -C limit pcap file length, -n disable name resolution) DUMPOPTS="-n" TSHARK_PATH=/home/seraph/Desktop/tshark_output HN=`hostname` SCRIPTDIR=$SESSION_DIR LOGDIR=/var/log
if [ "x$1" = "xstart" ]; then
tcpdump ${DUMPOPTS} -w n5.eth0.pcap -i eth0 < /dev/null & tcpdump ${DUMPOPTS} -w n5.eth1.pcap -i eth1 < /dev/null &
elif [ "x$1" = "xstop" ]; then mkdir -p ${TSHARK_PATH}/pcap mv *.pcap ${TSHARK_PATH}/pcap
elif [ `uname` = "FreeBSD" ]; then SCRIPTDIR=/tmp/e0_$HN LOGDIR=$SCRIPTDIR fi

if [ "x$1" = "xstart" ]; then

metadata.parameter: interface_names=no ip_addresses=no ipv6_addresses=no node_labels=yes link_labels=yes show_api=no background_images=no annotations=yes grid=yes traffic_start=1
